title: Postgame Show: Refran Del Dia
description:
Le Batard and the crew discuss the latest developments regarding Mike Schur's attempt to resign from our show and Papi Le Batard joins us for the Refran Del Dia.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
